g.text: EMF proportional to rate of flux change
Lenz's Law - Direction of Induced EMF
EMF induced proportional to rate of flux change
Induced EMF opposes the change causing it
Determine directions in generators and motors
Lenz's law ensures energy is conserved - work must be done against induced EMF
ε = -N(dΦ/dt) = -N d(BA cos θ)/dt = BLv (for moving conductor)
